definitions.definition: an active disagreement between people with opposing opinions or principles:
examples: There was a lot of conflict between him and his father.

definitions.definition: fighting between two or more groups of people or countries:
examples: We wish to avoid conflict between our countries if at all possible.

definitions.definition: If beliefs, needs, or facts, etc. conflict, they are very different and cannot easily exist together or both be true:
examples: The results of the new research would seem to conflict with existing theories.
